verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Look at the sky:
I draw clouds for you.
Look at the sky and say
You see My dreams.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You know, it's simple and easy
Heaven is created by God.
Everyone can draw his dream in Heaven and fly with it.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I did not know how to soar so high.
I didn't want to dream so boldly.
"Break into my fate, - I prayed to You, -
And give me wings, I want to change everything! "

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
2. Love overflowed the heart.
I do not remember sadness and pain.
I feel the breath of paradise
When my soul is with You!
